text.section: If a person timely files, the person may apply to intervene in a proceeding before the Commission.

The Commission shall grant leave to intervene unless the Commission concludes that:
the parties to the proceeding adequately represent the interest of the person seeking to intervene; or
the issues that the person seeks to raise are irrelevant or immaterial.

section.section: An intervenor has all the rights of a party to a proceeding.
In a proceeding before the Commission, an individual who is an intervenor may represent himself or herself.
